refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: The p:os-exec step runs an external command passing the input that arrives on its source port as standard input, reading result from standard output, and error from standard error.

para.error: It is a dynamic error if the command cannot be run.
It is a dynamic error if the current working directory cannot be changed to the value of the cwd option.
It is a dynamic error if the path-separator option is specified and is not exactly one character long.
It is a dynamic error if more than one document appears on the source port of the p:os-exec step.
It is a dynamic error if the exit code from the command is greater than the specified failure-threshold value.

para.impl: If cwd is not specified, the current working directory is implementation-defined.
The specific exit status values returned by a process invoked with p:os-exec are implementation-dependent.
